item.title: Hack.lu 2019 - Baby Kernel 2 writeup
item.description: Last october, I participated to Hack.lu Capture The Flag with my team Securimag. I did this writeup as all the ones I've read do not explain how they managed to reliably find the offset of real_cred in the current_task structure. Read more at https://xarkes.com/b/hacklu-2019-babykernel-wu.html
item.dc:creator: xarkes
